name: Flabébé
flavorText:
It draws out and controls the hidden power
of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds
is most likely part of its body.
formDescription: Forms only differ in appearance.  Flabébé's flower is set when it is encountered, and cannot be changed.

previous.name: Pyroar
previous.flavorText:
The male with the largest mane of fire
is the leader of the pride.

next.name: Floette
next.flavorText:
It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for
flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws
out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
next.formDescription:
Floette's five regular forms only differ in appearance.  Floette's flower is set when it is encountered, or as a Flabébé, and cannot be changed.

Eternal Floette has higher stats, cannot evolve or breed, and learns light of ruin at level 50.  It is currently not obtainable.

pokemon.name: Flabébé
pokemon.flavorText:
It draws out and controls the hidden power
of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds
is most likely part of its body.
pokemon.formDescription: Forms only differ in appearance.  Flabébé's flower is set when it is encountered, and cannot be changed.

pokemon.name: Floette
pokemon.flavorText:
It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for
flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws
out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
pokemon.formDescription:
Floette's five regular forms only differ in appearance.  Floette's flower is set when it is encountered, or as a Flabébé, and cannot be changed.

Eternal Floette has higher stats, cannot evolve or breed, and learns light of ruin at level 50.  It is currently not obtainable.

pokemon.name: Florges
pokemon.flavorText:
It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory,
and it obtains power from basking in the energy
emitted by flowering plants.
pokemon.formDescription: Forms only differ in appearance.  Florges's flower is set as a Flabébé or Floette, and cannot be changed.
